title: The European Union Provides Additional €30 million to Support Palestine Refugees through United Nations Relief ...
text: ( Source : European Commission - Directorate-General for Enlargement ) In the context of the efforts to help addressing the plight of the refugees in the wider Middle East region, the European Union (EU) announced that it will support
